title: How to transfer data files via Bluetooth
answer:
Enter into the music player or gallery and select any file you want to send, click in the right corner, and select Share > Bluetooth in the pop-up menu to transfer files. 

 Open your browser and enter into any page, press ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109978) > to Share page > Bluetooth. 

 Enter into the phone book, press the Menu button and a menu pops up, choose to share the contacts displayed, select the contacts to be shared, and click ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=109979) > Bluetooth.
